name: Robbin Sigmon
text: This is our go in a hurry spot. Thin crusted two topping pizza. Always so good.  They are always eager to recommend combos for us. Great attitude's and friendly people.

name: Judith Hindom-Remington
text: First time trying this location!  Pizza üçï was delicious ü§§!  Definitely not stingy on the toppings.  Ready within 10 min. of ordering on-line. Very nice & friendly staff when picking up!  We WILL be back.

name: Jessica Hirt
text: Very nice staff. From drivers to in store.  Every interaction I've had lately has been pleasant.  The food i order has all been up to par.  üëç :üòÄ

name: Stephanie Whisnant
text: I have ordered pizza from Domino's for years. I have never had a bad experience with them. I just ordered again and the lady I spoke with was very nice. The guy that delivered the pizza was supper nice. I have no complaints for them. Thank you Domino's Staff :)

name: David Dosomething
text: Top shelf!!! Came through for someg hungry young men!!! And was more then happy to help us complete the task at hand!!! The staff was professional and funny. Pizza hut should get some tips on how to treat customers!! Thank you  for your service we will definitely be coming back again and again!

name: aj babyy
text: Always a great experience whether I use the mobile app and order online or if I call and place a order. Delivery drivers are always nice and food is to perfection. This Dominos has a great team.

name: Lora Herndon
text: Good food and friendly staff. My only complaint is that their delivery range isn't very far. They are set pretty out of the way to drive there as often as I'd like.

name: susan blanzy
text: Usually very good.  However last week I ordered and it took an hour for delivery. Once it arrived all was cold. Pizza wasn't even warm.

name: Chris C.
text: Deep dish meat lovers with double cheese is the BEST.

name: Joseph
text: Awesome pizza. Great delivery drivers.

name: Gene Austin
text: The Valdese Domino's is a favorite.  Love it.

name: Matt Thomas
text: I'm on the rewards system and so far have gotten 2 medium 2 topping pizzas

name: Ben Smith
text: Dominos consecutively steps up their game!

name: Diane Hamby
text: Great job man

name: sashank chennupalli
text: Worst customer service ever. I called  to place an order for the pizza after getting an error message while placing the order on the website. The lady who took the order was not technical Savy and couldn't place the order. The general manager got on the phone and he was very rude. Go to pizza hut, this store sucks

name: Babygirl
text: Great thin crust pizza

name: Phil Whisenant
text: Small portions!

name: kevin hege
text: fast

name: Steven Tyler Roberts
text: Great food , fast service good people

name: Summer Knight
text: Great pizza at a great price

name: Anthony Martinez
text: Good pizza fast delivery
